text: Mosis nonɨm nap kɨli God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nɨm, ñɨ Mosis nop tɨkɨlek ñɨn ak nɨgɨlek, ne ñɨ teplep yɨbɨl yek. Anɨb ak tek kɨli Yijip bɨnonɨm11.23 Yijip binɨb okok, kɨli bɨnonɨm kɨli okok mɨdupsek kɨlop Pelo agelɨgɨpal. nop ma pɨlɨkɨl, takaw nop tɨbɨlɨkɨl, takan omɨŋal nokom ñɨ ak nop we gel yek.
